title: Purgatory
description:
A painful to watch debate between John Fetterman and Dr. Oz (00:10:00). Chris Curtis says cheering for Zappe on Monday night proves Courtney Cox's charity point (00:11:30). Dave Portnoy puts the Dave Portnoy Show in purgatory (00:25:30). Michael Kay gives a great comparison to the Yankees using the 2004 Red Sox as an example (00:36:10). Tim in Canton needs advice on proving his KMS loyalty, calls & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
